CustomField.description: Blocks all modifications (through Modification Context) that are not related to Trigger Context records in 'before insert', 'before update' and 'before delete' trigger handlers. The system will throw BoostException when the code will try to modify records. This type of operations should be executed in the After triggers.

CustomField.label: Block non-trigger data changes
